descriptionHTML:
Zombie Hunter is one of the best free zombie games ever! Get ready to survive the zombie apocalypse in the ultimate first person shooter sniper game. Take your gun, aim to the head and kill the undead with headshots to stop the deadly plague virus infection. You are the only one capable to stop living dead waves, destroy the zombie horde, survive and save humanity! Do you think you can do it? Try this zombie survival game and survive undead becoming a real zombie hunter! Stunning 3D graphics, action and tons of shooting are waiting for you.

The Zombie Apocalypse has just begun. A virus pandemic is spreading over the world, and people are starting to mutate into some kind of walking dead. Humanity is in danger, and you have been called to help survivors by killing the zombie outbreak. Travel to Dead Zone, take your rifle and try your sniper skills shooting the unkilled! You will need strategy, precision and cold blood to stop the zombie assault in this action shooter game. Survival is the only way. Keep your finger on the trigger and make headshots to every living dead!

★ Download Zombie Hunter, the best free zombie shooter game, and start killing living deads right now! Become the ultimate combat killer and end the plague virus infection! ★


SHOOT ZOMBIES; STOP VIRUS PANDEMIC
In Zombie Hunter you are a sniper that must save humanity from a zombie outbreak. Hundreds of civilians are waiting to be saved! Kill zombies before they can reach people. You must be quick in this 3D action survival game full of undead enemies!

SEVERAL GAME MODES
Shoot zombies hordes from a helicopter, defeat zombie bosses in special missions, play as a zombie instead as a survivor, use dogs to help you to find treasures and kill enemies, aim from a rooftop… You have many ways to play Zombie Hunter!

TENS OF MISSIONS AND MAPS
Infested City, Abandoned Theme Park, Dead Port, Arctic… Travel to each Dead Zone and kill your zombie enemies through tens of funny missions. Take your sniper rifle and shoot every walking dead. Aim and make a headshot in this 3D undead shooter game!

DOZENS OF WEAPONS TO UPGRADE
Do you prefer sniper rifles, assault rifles, bazookas or machine guns? Choose your favorite and upgrade them! They can be more powerful and faster, which is very useful when you are fighting a living dead army. It will be easier to make headshots in the game!

STUNNING 3D GRAPHICS
Zombies are more real than ever! You will be impressed by graphics, new gameplay and immersive soundtrack. Environments are detailed and bullet time will enchant you! Zombie Hunter is the best zombie apocalypse game with FPS and action elements!

GET POWERUPS!
You can use several power ups to help you in combat. Improve your aim, stop the time, get extra energy… You will need some of them if you want to kill all zombies with headshots! Because the more headshots you make, the more money you win!

PLAY OFFLINE OR ONLINE!
Don’t you have internet connection? No wifi around you? No worries! You can play this zombie game online or offline, which means you can enjoy every part of Zombie Hunter without being connected to the net. Isn’t it wonderful?


Mankind needs you to stop the undead plague infection! Zombies are searching for brains and you are the only one who can destroy them. Will you end the living dead war killing them all? Take your sniper rifle and bullets, call your dog, go to the Dead Zone and prepare to fight against the forces of evil! Hunting zombies have never been so funny!

If you like First Person Shooter (FPS games), zombie survival games, sniper games and strategy war games, you will enjoy Zombie Hunter! It’s fun, challenging and has a very intense and innovative gameplay that surely you will enjoy. Join the Zombie Hunter army and start shooting every walking dead in the ultimate zombie sniper game! Long live to living dead!

Official game video: https://youtu.be/C6l3c4RygcM

comments: So much development has went into this game, the reason why I like it is because of the consistent updates and new stuff. It's hard to find games now with nothing new to bring to the table. It makes you want to invest into this game. Not to mention how generous they can be with the free gifts and whatnot. Keep it up Netmarble!

This game is awesome. Love playing it everyday and everytime. But  recently I have a problem with the game crashing almost all the time. Please help me fix this problem.  I also want to ask when will you give Odin a uniform? A better skillset, a heal, and a piercing ability for him to shine again as a god. Looking forward to it Netmarble.

There are some incredibly predatory practices with the in app purchases.  For example, if you buy the new Emma Frost pack, you won't get her work fully leveled gear, and that isn't made clear on the purchase screen.  You will need to buy the package at least once, and possible multiple times over to actually advance her.
Downloaded d game yesterday thinking am gonna have a swell time . it's telling me unable to establish a network connection. That's d error code I get . pls I need help on this

After 2+ years playing this game I am done with the greed and direction of the developer. Used to be free to play, then pay to win. Now it's pay alot for over half of the new content and every new thing costs more and more. Nothing but a money suck and all the fun of Marvel has been sucked out of the game with it. Stay away unless you have $100 s lying around that you don't need. Shame really.
Was having a great time playing until this new update. I get booted out of the app every two missions now.
description: An epic blockbuster action-RPG featuring Super Heroes and Villains from the Marvel Universe!The Avengers, Guardians of the Galaxy, Inhumans, Defenders, X-Men, Spider-Man, and more!Over 100 characters from the Marvel Universe are available to play!S.H.I.E.L.D.’s very own director, Nick Fury, has sent an urgent message from the future... the convergence is destroying the world as we know it! Prepare to defend your universe!Recruit your favorite characters, complete missions, and compete with other players to be the greatest hero and save your world.Collect over 100 Marvel Super Heroes and Super Villains to assemble your ultimate team.- Level up your characters and their gear to unleash their full powers!- Build classic teams like the Avengers or X-Men to take advantage of special bonus effects.- Choose from hundreds of Uniforms to increase your character’s powers and perfect your hero's look.Upgrade powerful characters in Epic Quests!- Get everyone’s favorite Super Heroes, from Captain Marvel to Doctor Strange, and level them up while playing thrilling Epic Quests.- Unleash each character’s unique super powers as you make your way through various missions. Blast enemies with Iron Man’s Unibeam and bash opponents in the name of justice with Captain America’s shield!- Experience even more thrilling action in PvP Arena modes, where you can bring your best team to take on the world.Team up with friends and overcome incredible in-game challenges.- Take a friend’s character with you when you go into a mission for emergency assistance!- Join an Alliance and make friends. Compete with other Alliances in Alliance Conquest and take home the glory for your own team.Original new stories only found in Marvel Future Fight!- Experience unique, never-before-seen stories to find out who’s responsible for threatening the existence of your universe!- Play through Special Missions featuring the New Avengers, Inhumans, and even Spidey’s Foes!Terms of Service: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/terms_of_service.aspPrivacy Policy: http://help.netmarble.com/policy/privacy_policy.asp
descriptionHTML:
An epic blockbuster action-RPG featuring Super Heroes and Villains from the Marvel Universe!

The Avengers, Guardians of the Galaxy, Inhumans, Defenders, X-Men, Spider-Man, and more!
Over 100 characters from the Marvel Universe are available to play!

S.H.I.E.L.D.’s very own director, Nick Fury, has sent an urgent message from the future... the convergence is destroying the world as we know it! Prepare to defend your universe!
Recruit your favorite characters, complete missions, and compete with other players to be the greatest hero and save your world.

Collect over 100 Marvel Super Heroes and Super Villains to assemble your ultimate team.
- Level up your characters and their gear to unleash their full powers!
- Build classic teams like the Avengers or X-Men to take advantage of special bonus effects.
- Choose from hundreds of Uniforms to increase your character’s powers and perfect your hero's look.

Upgrade powerful characters in Epic Quests!
- Get everyone’s favorite Super Heroes, from Captain Marvel to Doctor Strange, and level them up while playing thrilling Epic Quests.
- Unleash each character’s unique super powers as you make your way through various missions. Blast enemies with Iron Man’s Unibeam and bash opponents in the name of justice with Captain America’s shield!
- Experience even more thrilling action in PvP Arena modes, where you can bring your best team to take on the world.

Team up with friends and overcome incredible in-game challenges.
- Take a friend’s character with you when you go into a mission for emergency assistance!
- Join an Alliance and make friends. Compete with other Alliances in Alliance Conquest and take home the glory for your own team.

Original new stories only found in Marvel Future Fight!
- Experience unique, never-before-seen stories to find out who’s responsible for threatening the existence of your universe!
- Play through Special Missions featuring the New Avengers, Inhumans, and even Spidey’s Foes!

comments: Spin my ride No more speed, I'm almost there! Gotta keep cool, now gotta take care. Last car to pass, here I go! As the line of cars are going so slow! 5 star rad! Gotta get back to the game, all. See ya....Speed thrills!

Can one also be able yo take turns??  I dont like it straight all the way to nowere. And brake should be fully efective one should STOP anytime he wants and also dont sale cars it should just be affordable by coins  Its really a gr8 game but only a little more work.

The game itself is very fun to play and very entertaining, however, the points system is a bit off. The reason for that is it not about the distant (which I like about) it about how many overtake you can take in a single game. That is what I dislike about this game. Also the cars... Not a lot of cars (need more). Few questions: Will there be such thing as upgrade speed or car customization? Will there be special event like special map that the highest rank get some kind of reward? And lastly will there be a competition of ranking ?  If all the that happening in the future this game definitely deserved 5 stars .

Basic. You have to over take cars... That's it. When they talk about the physics being like simulation they are lieing. Left right go stop. Poor 16bit sound that you will want to turn off. It's like a game from the 80s. Uninstall.

The game is very good but I really wish if the score is for the overtakes as well as the high speed that will be a lot better. Also, I wish if there were more cars. That would be really interesting. Actually it needs a lot of work because it's very boring

Hey, this game is just so good, just make few improvements like, try to create bends in your highway and add more cars, a little road features like tunnels, two way traffic feature. This way you will have killed me. gameplay is so nice anyway.

comments: Game is addictivly fun but way to easy. I got to level 5 which is 6500 trophies with a 95% win rate in 168 games played. I think they should up the difficulty a little bit as you get higher up the ranks. But overall a really great game!

There are bugs.  After first few games, the player stops jumping up when he wins.  Also first few games, just keep pressing low balls and you can win AI already without the need to smash, etc.  Fun and entertaining game.  Can be improved.  I really like it.

A great game to play if you need to waste some time and if you are a fan of the game and have played yourself!!! Wish you can rematch if you wanted to though, and can't figure out how to play with your friends from Facebook or Google!! So far those 2 things are my only complaints for this game!!!

I wish I could attached a screenshot here. Even on buying your most expensive equipment I'm loosing on stats... Even the deal u are asking to purchase for $4.99 is reducing my technical stats. Good game but u have to look at many glitches regarding stats and upgrades

You guys need to improve the local players challenging feature, it hangs a lot during the game time... Moreover from the two players challenging eachother, they require to connect to a common third party wifi instead of anyone player's mobile teathering... Please improve it..  Thank you..

Game is fun and addictive but too easy. I got up to level 31 which is total of 12800 trophies with 99.9% win rate in 132 games played. I think developers need to up the difficulty more. It is becoming less of a challenge.

descriptionHTML:
The most competitive badminton games ever! Take on your friends in 1 vs 1 mode, or win the Badminton League trophy🏆 in Tournament Mode!

Customizing your character with tons of items. And level up your ability to do stronger smash and jump!

Now grab your racket to smash, hit the shuttlecock, do a crazy smash to your opponent like badminton star!

Features:
- Multiple game modes available, play with sports fans in local
- Create your very own character, and level - up
- Easy to control, challenging to win
- Simple and elegant UI design
- Cool stunts and realistic hitting shuttlecock experience
- Numerous gorgeous badminton outfits

How to play with friends in 1 vs 1 Mode:
1. Connect the same WiFi or Personal Hotspot with your friends
2. Open "Badminton League" and select 1 vs 1 Mode together
3. Bet with coins, tap "HOST" to create a room, then waiting for your friend to join
4. Check the name which shows on the board, then tap to join
5. Now you will know who is the Newbie

Remind your friends to download Badminton League before above operation :)

This game needs an internet connection to play.
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Badminton-League-203729826806154/

comments: Well I think you need better graphics and I don't like how it is slow when you turn. Plus it has TOO MANY ADS! I just started playing this game! The pictures showing the terrains is probably copied off of MCPE's pictures (I am not saying it is! But it might be). I really like this game I really do but there needs to be some changes. People aren't going to like this game if there isn't some changes. I just read a comment saying this game is "gay". That was incredibly rude. People shouldn't call it "dumb" or "gay" just because this game needs better graphics or it has to many ads. Does anyone even know the definition of "gay"? There is two meanings for it but they both mean your happy! Stop calling the game names! It is not necessary to!

I love this game, it's sooooo fun but my only problem is the ads. It was fine when I first downloaded it, there were no ads but after I upgrade the game, all of a sudden there's ads every second. If you can get rid of the ads, I would greatly appreciate it

There's so many things wrong with this I don't even know where to start. First off your in a confined space and if you go so far you just hit a blue wall. If in was infinitely generated and you could go farther it might be better. Second its kind of slow when moving. Third since the whole confined space thing you have each different biome all pushed together so when you walk two steps your in a different biome and its small. So you extremely need to make it better.

So, the game itself is incredibly enjoyable and fun. Sometimes the controls get me here and there, but I'm sure, with time, I'd get use to it. The thing is, THERE IS NO TIME. Literally every minute, I get a thirty second ad. I'm just here building my home and making foundation when all of a sudden, an ad pops up. I say, "oh okay, it's just one, whatevs." WRONG. It is now ten, just over the past 5 minutes. This game has serious potential, if only it'd let us play the game and cut out the ads. I'm spending more time watching ads rather than using time to efficiently play the game. It irks me, so I uninstalled the ap. It really is a good game, just lower the ads from 2 per minute, kay?

Just like minecraft !!! This game is amazing I pick this over mine craft for any body who actually reads reviews like me listen ! This game is amazing ! The only thing I want y'all to fix is that easy mode needs night and that hard mode needs to just give you the supplies you need because some things you need you can't scavenge.
"Oh, it's just like Minecraft." Yes. It's exactly like Minecraft. Well no, not quite: this game is awful and that game is great. Overall, terrible game, fake reviews. Outta this house

comments: Nice game with very good events but the drop rates to heroes of 5 star is too low i killed a lot of gems and scrols and hero orbs and my first 5 star i  dropped it at lvl 75. Okok now again event of summoning 100 scrolls and i continue still no 5 star hero only 4, just try and fix the drop rate. In the rest its a nice game.

Too much pay to win, free players hardly getting anywhere in the events and so fourth, not fair, increase the rewards of spending money and give free players more too easily solved, I previously rated it 5 stars instantly loved it but as I've progressed it's just not fair!! Please do something!! I am vip6 but I'm not rich, please bring more rewards for loyal free users who watch the ads and everything!! Thank you!!

I purchased the spring festival card on top of all the money I've already dumped into this game and the devs didn't give me my in game rewards. I've submitted numerous tickets to get a refund or my rewards and they just reply there is no problem. Ya no problem with you taking my money.  They deleted my review, wonder how many other people had this issue and had reviews deleted.

Wasn't sure about this game at first. I love it. I use a f2p  and a vip one  to see  the difference  between the two. Really well done. Having said all that the game does require patience. This is an IDLE game. You pick it up do dailies, talk, spend money, or what ever you want to do in game, then put it down to "farm gold,xp,mats". The high end heros do take some planning to aquire as a f2p player. This game requires patience because it's an IDLE game. Yes some people have a ton of money to throw at the game but don't be jealous, just play your game and have fun.

There is certainly alot to do, but is there really much to DO do? I've just been continually tapping red dots and getting free prizes, which (although nice) doesn't feel like I'm especially earning anything, you know?  Feels like a game that will keep you occupied for maybe months, but a year after you delete it will you really REMEMBER it? Probably not.

Not what I expected, given that my first impression of it was of IH being an "annoying add". Once I decided to pick it up though my thoughts changed rather drastically.   It's simple, it's fun and the warm colour palette of the graphics make a nice change compared to the widespread use of bleak colours in other games.   If you think you might enjoy this game, you sure are my friend.

description: Run to chase after the robber and explore the endless running worlds of Talking Tom Gold Run! Race to catch the fun with loads of FREE CHARACTERS and the SPECIAL NEW CHARACTER, PRINCESS ANGELA! She lives in a magical place called MEDIEVAL TOWN. So, get ready to go for the gold in this exciting SIDE WORLD. Or test your snowboarding skills in the Snowboard Side World! Race snowboards on the snow! Rule the slopes! And have endless fun playing one of the best infinite runners out there! Whether you’re a kid, or just young at heart, this cool game will have you running, jumping, and getting an EPIC ADRENALINE RUSH IN NO TIME AT ALL! ★ Get a rush as you run through the subway tunnel to the new side world, Medieval Town. ★ Race down the slopes and ride the halfpipe on your new snowboard – it’s super cool!!!★ Meet special guest star, Princess Angela, and spend the winter with your favorite characters, Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger!GET READY, GET SET, RUN!! Come and have fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chase after the robber who stole your gold and unlock new worlds. Do you have what it takes to run through all the worlds and win? It’s not super easy to be the best, but we believe in you! Start running and racing now. It’s time to go for gold! Run to chase the robber – he’s got your gold! Use the gold bars you get back to build and upgrade amazing homes for Talking Tom and Friends! The finished homes will then unlock new worlds just for you! So, what are you waiting for? Let’s run for fun this winter! ★★★ENJOY THE FUN OF TALKING TOM GOLD RUN★★★ENDLESS FUN: With endless running, racing, and snowboarding, the fun never ends!!!MISSIONS AND REWARDS: Win missions to get cool rewards! BUILD AMAZING HOMES: Use the gold bars you collect to build homes for Talking Tom and Friends! UNLOCK NEW RUNNING WORLDS: Explore even more fun worlds when you upgrade your home! RUN WITH SPECIAL CHARACTERS: Run even faster and do cool tricks with the help of special characters!PLAY FOR FREE! This app contains:The possibility to use and connect with friends via social networks;The option to make in-app purchases;Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (build progress, in-game functionalities, etc.);Promotions for Outfit7’s products, as well as advertising;Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress;Videos to watch starring Outfit7’s animated characters via YouTube integration; andLinks that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps.This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 has established COPPA-compliant privacy practices to protect the personal information of children. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/Customer support: support@outfit7.com

Or test your snowboarding skills in the Snowboard Side World! Race snowboards on the snow! Rule the slopes! And have endless fun playing one of the best infinite runners out there!

The puzzles are interesting, the animations are generally enjoyable. It quickly becomes a grind, though, where you aren't enjoying the gameplay, you're just trying to get past the timewasters of the daily challenge, or fighting the arbitrary points of the arena. The clan battles and Mighty Eagle challenge are the best parts, but you can't play them all the time. You have to grind away in the Arena.

I just purchased a new phone. And being I'm using the same e-mail address i would have thought it would have started me at the same level I had been on prior to the new phone. Kinda sucks because i had spent a near fortune and was at level 64 ! Unless they can fix this I will remove the game for good. I mean I had every hat except the ones that cost 25,000. Now I'm at zero!

RESUBMITTED: Arena games were sucked up by those high-card players or maybe cheaters. My power cards are the same, just like my opponent, or higher than my opponent's cards. When I slinging those piggies or blocks, it gives me lower points like 4 hundred thousand. But if my opponent slinging them all, it gives higher points like 7.5 million. I lost my winning streaks so I had to play again but it gives me same points so I lost again, sadly. I thought your arena games are really much fun, but they're not.

GAH! They've over complicated this game with unnecessary graphics and gifts and prizes etc. I couldn't even figure out how to get into the levels for a while haha. I'm sure if I had the patience to go through and understand it properly it would be fine, but I didn't want to. Old angry birds setup was better. Wish you didn't change it. Uninstalled after 1 day.

Classic gameply bogged down by aggravating fremium distration. Havent run into any energy bars yet and already on second world. New birds add interesting gameplay elements but spells are an automatic win that add no semse of achievement besides skipping a hard level. If you want some classic angry birds but dont mind clicking through to get to it then give this a download.
description: Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.SPECTACULAR SPELLS!Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.-----------------------------Discover:https://www.angrybirds.com/Follow:https://www.facebook.com/angrybirdshttps://twitter.com/AngryBirds-----------------------------Angry Birds 2 is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, get ready to rain destruction on those swindling swine!This game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse to any web page- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from third partiesThis game may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. descriptionHTML:
Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?

CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!
It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!

NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!
You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.

SPECTACULAR SPELLS!
Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!
Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!

DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!
There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.

comments: I think that the game is silly yet good!This game does not have another level of playing. I think that the temple ruins and waterfall and the other levels are the same!e but the description given to it is a little too much. The levels do not have anything more than just the same setting. I think that the creator of his game should've made the game in such a way that it has different levels and it helps us to get more bananas or something like that. But overall, the game is pretty good. Good job on the game.😁😁

Towards the end it gets boring. One has to start all over from the first scene, every time one dies. There should be an option to start from other worlds as well. It is really annoying. Also the last levels are at times impossible, for eg. in world 6 almost all the vines are slippery and you never know when you'll loose grip on them, causing you to fall and die.  I like the option of watching a video and getting double bananas or the chance to continue. I also like the sounds although spiky plants can be annoying.

descriptionHTML:

descriptionHTML:
※The Next Generation Strategy MMO "Kingdom Craft" has now available in Philippine!

Players from other regions can pre-register now to receive Super-Powered rewards!

The detailed graphics and innovative game modes are unlike any real time MMO strategy game you've ever played! Collect and train historical heroes from three kingdoms to participate in massive online PVP battles, where the best strategist will reign supreme;
Or interact with in-game female streamers to get all your questions answered! With the world at your fingertips, will you become a benevolent ruler respected by his people, or will you become a conqueror that unifies the whole Kingdom?



---Features---

# An archaistic masterpiece

The design team focused on recreating both the architecture and the atmosphere from ancient times, so you will be able to enjoy the amazing scenery and beautiful music as they roam the land.

# Interact with female influencers inside the game

With the game's innovative in-game broadcasting system, you will be able to chat, ask questions and send gifts to our female streamers when playing the game!

# Build alliances with players worldwide

Whether you're the military commander, the adviser, the diplomat or the pacifist, there is a spot for you. Do what you do best and help your Alliance dominate the land!

# Collect and command Super-powered heroes

Zhang Fei, Zhao Yun, Zhuge Liang, Cao Cao...recruit these Three Kingdom heroes and command them to achieve greatness!

# Conquer kingdoms & fight against other lords with tactical real-time MMO battle action

Even though you might not have met them, your allies are your greatest assets. Join them and help them repel the enemies! Those who resist must perish as your Alliance moves closer to the throne!

Log in for 8 days total to get 5-Star XiaoQiao, purchase for the first time to get legendary ZhangFei, and legendary CaoCao from store specials!

descriptionHTML:
Manage your own Cafe Restaurant and join the cooking game fever. Create a new recipes and stories, travel through different countries and become a world chef.


MANY LEVELS AND HOURS OF FUN
More than 120 levels to complete and new seasons every month!

IMPROVE YOUR MENTAL SPEED
Each level is a challenge for your mind, the number of clients and orders will grow and you will have to attend as quickly as possible.

OPEN COFFEE SHOPS THROUGHOUT THE WORLD
What are you waiting for to invest your money and open another cafe in Japan or France. New recipes and decorations await for you in each country.

IMPROVE YOUR MACHINES
Acquire new machines for your cafeteria, upgrade them and give them maintenance. Ovens, blenders, blenders, coffee mills!

NEW RECIPES AND COMBINATIONS
Learn new recipes and complex combinations. Your clients will pay more for an Unicorn Frappé or Frozen Green Tea!

CUTE DECORATIONS
Add decorations and turn your cafe into a luxurious meeting point to eat a delicious Subways!

IMPROVE YOUR ADMINISTRATOR'S SKILLS
Choose between a girl or a boy to train an expert and prepare the richest coffees, Frappuccinos, Lattes, Cupcakes, Pizzas and Hot cakes. The best starbucks simulator game.

MINIGAMES
Take advantage of the bonus time by dropping coffee drops and collecting tons of prizes!

MONITOR THE WI-FI AREA
Fix the Wi-Fi zone when it fails and prevent people from going mad without paying!

descriptionHTML:
War is coming! Are you ready for an epic combat? Join now with your friends in Goddess: Primal Chaos, the cinematic real-time 3D action MMORPG mobile game!

Transform yourself into a legendary hero, summon ultimate dragons and monsters, kill the dominating Tyrant for revenge and battle your way against millions of online players worldwide!

Order or chaos? Only the strong can survive in this clash age! Do you have what it takes to win the battle and conquer the world? Lead your hero to victory and rush forth on a fantasy adventure now!

= GAME FEATURES =
- Stunning visuals with excellent 3D graphics and special animation effects
- Choose from wide range of heroes: Summoner, Warrior or Bloodline
- Collect rare blades and rings to upgrade and evolve your super heroes
- Equip your heroes with unique Mounts, Swords, Gears, Weapons and Furious Wings
- Hack and Slash! Easy to control, one-tap combo and amazing experience
- Manually choose targets or directions when unleashing skills. You call the shots!
- Challenge Multiplayer Dungeon, Boss World, Urgent Wild and more dynamic quests
- Fight alongside exclusive Goddesses of mass destruction. You will never be alone!
- Vanquish the force of evils in discord and occupy their generous legacy
- Forge powerful alliances to maximize your growth and rally league to defeat rivals
- Various PvP modes in Arena:1v1, 2v2, 3v3, Team battle and Alliance War

Plus, even more exciting contents and new gameplays await your discovery! Try the hottest next-gen game of 2017 now! You will be the King of Legend!

Note: Goddess: Primal Chaos is FREE-TO-PLAY but some in-game items require payment. An internet connection is also required to play.

Visit our Facebook Page at: https://www.facebook.com/GoddessPrimalChaos/
developerAddress: 5118 HOPEWELL CENTRE 183 QUEEN'S ROAD EAST WANCHAI HONG KONG
recentChanges: 1.New Event Path to Valor
2.New System Dragon Crests
3.Treasure Exchange
4.Newly added Nightmare difficulty Dungeons
5.Monthly Card update
summary: Collect exclusive Goddesses! Defeat your enemies! Hack and slash!
title: Goddess: Primal Chaos - SEA  Free 3D Action MMORPG

comments: Every 30+/- second match ends followed by a 30 second ad. That's not the kind of game that will stay installed on my phone. I'd also like to be able to customize my player but failed to see an option for that.

description: Ninja Punch Boxing Warrior & Kung Fu Karate Fighter will give you experience of ninja punch boxing & kung fu karate fights in HD quality in combo fighting game play. The Ninja Punch Boxing Warrior & Kung Fu Karate Fighter 3d game is designed especially for kung fu karate fighting lovers and punch boxing lovers from all around the world. A punch boxing superstar career challenges will drive you to take risky hits. Easy gameplay and full control. Use the touch gestures on the screen, and for each gesture have a different blow, your quickness and technique will make you a great champion. Test new striking techniques, like karate kicks and boxing punches or even gymnastic dodging and jumping art of fighting. Beat all tag rivals in this world wrestling competition game and become universal hero of boxing fight. Some enemies might be stronger than they look, so train yourself a lot to prove your strength as a real ninja fighter. Join the battle of rivals as a ninja warrior assassin fights. Let’s try ultimate action fighting game Ninja Punch Boxing Warrior & Kung Fu Karate Fighter. Play the toughest of real kick fighting games against world pro fighting champ ever. Are you expert enough to control a giant champions in this ninja punch boxing & karate kick fighting game? Control, punch, kick, super punch, super kick, flip kick and fight with all fighters cleverly and beat them badly in this real Ninja Punch Boxing Warrior & Kung Fu Karate Fighter games battle. Advanced animation and stunning 3d graphics bring the real ninja punch boxing experience in your hand, while intuitive touchscreen controls make jab, hook, and uppercut feel natural and fun. Use quick reflexes and special moves, unleash fierce punches and combos, beat all opponents and become the king of karate now. Go toe-to-toe against 30+ bone crushing fighters from Bangkok, Thailand, china, Japanese and Singapore.Become the strongest fighter on the earth playing Ninja Punch Boxing Warrior & Kung Fu Karate Fighter 3d action game. Explore different locations fighting for your life survival. Prove your worth as the powerful master ninja with ninja kung fu fighting & punch boxing 3d game. Fight with different ninja players & use different fighting styles including taekwondo, muay Thai, kung fu, boxing and other and enjoy real Japanese ninja assassin fights. Ninja fighting game opponents are ready for hard punch boxing and kung fu karate fighting show. Taekwondo & karate lovers will enjoy like punch boxing game experience. description: In Burger Shop, you successfully created a universal chain of restaurants and found fame and fortune... Until one day, you found yourself in a dumpster with a bump on your head, your restaurants boarded up, and no memory of how any of it happened. Now in Burger Shop 2 you must rebuild your restaurant empire, adding new twists to your menu to entice new customers while uncovering the truth about what happened to your original restaurant chain. Grab ingredients from the BurgerTron 2000 to create tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced food making game!GAME FEATURES:• 120 Story Levels and 120 Expert Levels!• Challenge Modes and Relax Modes!• Server breakfast, lunch, and dinner!• Over 100 different food items! • Over 100 trophies to collect! • Unlimited play!Burger Shop 2 offers endless play with four different play modes!GAME MODES:• Story Mode - Rebuild your restaurant empire, and solve the mystery of who or what destroyed your original burger chain.• Challenge Mode - Play lightning fast one-minute rounds - but don't lose a customer or it's all over!• Relax Mode - Serve food without any pressure or stress.   Customers are infinitely patient.• Expert Mode - So, you think you are the Burger Master?  Put your food-making skills to the test!Available in 11 languages:  English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Indonesian, Russian, and Japanese.
descriptionHTML:
In Burger Shop, you successfully created a universal chain of restaurants and found fame and fortune... Until one day, you found yourself in a dumpster with a bump on your head, your restaurants boarded up, and no memory of how any of it happened.

Now in Burger Shop 2 you must rebuild your restaurant empire, adding new twists to your menu to entice new customers while uncovering the truth about what happened to your original restaurant chain.

Grab ingredients from the BurgerTron 2000 to create tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced food making game!

GAME FEATURES:
• 120 Story Levels and 120 Expert Levels!
• Challenge Modes and Relax Modes!
• Server breakfast, lunch, and dinner!
• Over 100 different food items!
• Over 100 trophies to collect!
• Unlimited play!

Burger Shop 2 offers endless play with four different play modes!

GAME MODES:

• Story Mode - Rebuild your restaurant empire, and solve the mystery of who or what destroyed your original burger chain.

• Challenge Mode - Play lightning fast one-minute rounds - but don't lose a customer or it's all over!

• Relax Mode - Serve food without any pressure or stress. Customers are infinitely patient.

• Expert Mode - So, you think you are the Burger Master? Put your food-making skills to the test!


Available in 11 languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Swedish, Indonesian, Russian, and Japanese.

description: Bomber Adventure game has 5 lands and 250 to explore.To pass each level you must strategically place bomb to kill all enemies and destroy obstacles to find out the key.The way to control is nearly same with classic bomber game.You should collect more gold you can, so can use it to buy some power up items to improve your strength.You will die when colliding enemy, or time is over, or in range of bomb explossion.A little with other game bomber, bomb still explode when you get bomb explossion control, but you can blast bomb before predefinded time by press it.you will become super hero, super bomber if you explore all levels.Some enemies have special skill, they can chase you if you stand near them, specially the bosses can release bomb to destroy you.If which level is so difficult, you can play previous one to get more golds, and come back current level, buy more useful items to go through it.
descriptionHTML:
Bomber Adventure game has 5 lands and 250 to explore.
To pass each level you must strategically place bomb to kill all enemies and destroy obstacles to find out the key.
The way to control is nearly same with classic bomber game.
You should collect more gold you can, so can use it to buy some power up items to improve your strength.
You will die when colliding enemy, or time is over, or in range of bomb explossion.
A little with other game bomber, bomb still explode when you get bomb explossion control, but you can blast bomb before predefinded time by press it.
you will become super hero, super bomber if you explore all levels.
Some enemies have special skill, they can chase you if you stand near them, specially the bosses can release bomb to destroy you.
If which level is so difficult, you can play previous one to get more golds, and come back current level, buy more useful items to go through it.
recentChanges: Optimize Game
summary: Become super hero with Bomber Adventure
title: Bomber Adventure

description: Catboy, Gekko and Owlette are back in this brand new PJ Masks game app. Choose your favourite hero character to play with and journey across the moonlit rooftops, and through the night, collecting as many orbs as you can. But beware of those pesky villains, they’re up to mischief again!FEATURESCollectable orbsThe hero characters will be able to collect orbs to add to their final score.Gold AmuletsEach character is able to pick up gold amulets along the way to boost their final score. Make sure to keep your eyes out for them as they’re harder to find!Character Power-upsCollect the coloured amulets and trigger the heroes’ super powers: Catboy – ability to jump higherOwlette – ability to see hidden orbsGekko – ability to smash through obstaclesHazardsHelp the heroes dodgy the obstacles the villains are throwing in their way!The PJ Masks are on their way, into the night to save the day!No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of action and fun!Please note: This app is not compatible with some older Android devices
descriptionHTML:
Catboy, Gekko and Owlette are back in this brand new PJ Masks game app.

Choose your favourite hero character to play with and journey across the moonlit rooftops, and through the night, collecting as many orbs as you can. But beware of those pesky villains, they’re up to mischief again!

FEATURES

Collectable orbs
The hero characters will be able to collect orbs to add to their final score.

Gold Amulets
Each character is able to pick up gold amulets along the way to boost their final score. Make sure to keep your eyes out for them as they’re harder to find!

Character Power-ups
Collect the coloured amulets and trigger the heroes’ super powers:
Catboy – ability to jump higher
Owlette – ability to see hidden orbs
Gekko – ability to smash through obstacles

Hazards
Help the heroes dodgy the obstacles the villains are throwing in their way!

The PJ Masks are on their way, into the night to save the day!

No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of action and fun!

Please note: This app is not compatible with some older Android devices
developerAddress:
45 Warren Street
London
W1T 6AG

comments: The game is amazing, addicting and a lot of fun just to collect and level up dragons. The events that are constantly coming on always make you feel like you have something to do. However when of the events are very unbalanced and, if you are against one of these people, not very fun. The heroic races are a great way to compete with other players to add a powerful dragon to your collection but some people take the fun out of it by spending 100's of gems to ensure that they come first. The ability to use gems during these races should be removed as it is highly unbalanced, or at least add another way of collecting the heroic dragons without having to compete with people who pay to win.

I love this game. Its very addicting and fun, but I find that there are barely any female dragons. This upsets me very much and I would like for this to change. The only females I see are the dragons with names like  motherly dragon, belle dragon, viktoria dragons, and sleeping beauty dragons. There are also descriptions like "add some girly pink to your collections with the gummy dragon"(which is also coincidently a girl). Then I see cool legendary dragons, but OH plot twist they're all boys. This is a very fun game no doubt on that, but please, stop with the sexism and make cool female dragons. Thank you.

Still Having Lot's of Fun! Cool to mix different dragons just to see what u get!  I just opened my 6th island, When I first started playing this game I think there were only 3 or 4 islands & maybe about 300 to 400 dragons. I'm having trouble keeping them long enough to get the next island!😉😄😁!!

Game would be great except for the fact that you can't do certain things without bugging people on Facebook for help. I just want to play the game. I can't level my dragons past 10 without building a special building which you build without gems or bugging people. No way to get gems other than extremely slowly by completing achievements which take days to complete and give 1-3 gems. Supposedly you can watch videos for gems but there is absolutely no place on the game that allows this. If your friends on Facebook don't play this game they can't help you and you are screwed if you truly want to enjoy the game. You can't win battles with level 10 dragons. You can't breed more than one dragon at a time without gems. You can't expand past 2 islands without gems. If you get the required gems to level your dragons past 10, then there is another super expensive building to level them past 15, and get, guess what, you need gems for that too. Other games allow in game friends which this one doesn't and that is frankly ridiculous as it's a "social" game. Other games allow other ways to obtain gems like watching videos or trying other games which this one doesn't. There isn't enough time to complete special events for special limited dragons unless you can get gems. Overall, the game would be fantastic if gems were easier to come by and you could make in game friends instead of having to rely on Facebook friends!

Just a few gripes. 1st of all I LOVE DRAGON CITY. Been playing for years. About your survey, I would never. You ask for too many permissions. Tree of life....when I get a Dragon here comes the same Dragon adding up for hatching. Like why? 815+ dragons are more than enough. Why do u keep adding, adding, adding. We could NEVER get all of them as it is. Why more? Love me some Dragon City like a said in the beginning.

THIS IS THE BEST GAME EVER!!! I totally recommend it to EVERYONE who loves addictive games and dragons. I find myself constantly playing this game all the time! I honestly feel like I can't say how much I LOVE this game with words. Again, this is the best game a player can have. Just one thing, I wish there were more ways to get gems instead of just buying 'cause I can't buy anything. So please make gems more easier to get. Also please make the islands worth less gems.😊

Accept the challenge and prove your might!Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!FEATURES- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere. descriptionHTML:
Ready to take on the hottest role playing game out there and bend fire-breathing dragons to your will? Are you the one to claim the title of top Dragon Master in the world? Accept the challenge and prove your might!

Build a Dragon City on floating Islands and fill it with farms, habitats, buildings… and dragons! Collect and train your cute babies and evolve them into impressive beasts that will defend you in the PvP Arenas!

Join forces with other Dragon Masters in Alliances, interact in the chat and obtain rewards from the Alliance Chest.

Combine dragons of Fire, Nature, War, Legend and lots of other elements to hatch rare hybrids and expand your collection. You can also obtain dragons from exclusive events!

FEATURES

- Complete the Dragon Book! There are over 500 dragons to breed and collect.
- New dragons join the game every week through breeding events and special islands.
- Challenge yourself at the Dragon Quests and fight against other Masters in the PvP Arenas to collect exclusive dragons, claim Warrior’s Chests, and climb up the leaderboards!
- Summon dragons of the at the Tree Of Life and try their skills.
- Unlock advanced features like the Ancient World and the Guardian Dragons.
- Be social: Join Alliances to play with other masters, chat with them, and open Alliance Chests.
- Log in with Facebook to save your game and play on all your devices - That way you can take your baby dragons everywhere.

There are over 80 million Dragon Masters. What are you waiting for? Join the fun!

If you already love our dragons… Drop us a nice review :)

Dragon City is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Follow us on Twitter: @DragonCityGame
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DragonCity
Subscribe to our Youtube channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/DragonCityChannel

Check out other cool games by the creators of Dragon City: Monster Legends and World Chef!

recentChanges: Dragon City’s first social update: Play with other Dragon Masters!
- Join Alliances to chat and cooperate with other players!
- There’s a new element in the game: Primal! Come and discover their behavior in battle and be amazed by their look, a cool mix of dinosaurs, magic, and technology.

- Start opening Alliance Chests! By joining forces with the Dragons Masters in your Alliance to complete tasks, you'll be able to reach milestones and open Alliance Chests containing Primal Dragon Orbs!
summary: 💎Collect awesome dragons and become the ultimate Dragon Master! 🐲
title: Dragon City

comments: Love the concept of the game but the moment you start reaching higher castle lvl  that's when you realize that if you don't pay you will be on a long journey, ie.. PvP are out of the question everyone has minimum of 5 epic items, arena you will have to settle for 5th or less place due to power lvl difference. I am about 141000 fighting 190000 or 90000, which is not fair for those of low power or advantage to those of high.

Great game. Everything you could want in a game. Castle building, PvP. Unique equipment with special stats. Different attack types, economy classes. Rewards are rewarding enough. So far 5/5. The theme is good. The balance seems reasonable. My only suggestion is making to character limit for name changes bigger for the dwellers/subjects. Only thing I can constructively suggest. Or be able to type first and last name.

After playing for a few hours this I find this game good my only problem is that you need to pay for those epic drops? I mean in a game if you defeated the boss those are supposed to be yours without paying, I can accept paying for 1 dollar but the second boss requires me to purchase it for almost $3 I already paid for premium I don't want to pay for other things. Please make the drops free for premium members or have them cheap or totally free, or else after my premium I'll quit this game.

I loved this game very much, I had a lot of really nice things and invested nearly $60 dollars into making my guys 5 stars and diamonds and other level up promos... I was the clan leader of the "Bananna Kings" my main complaint is my phone rebooted and now I've lost everything... my game, my victories, my clan, and all the money I invested in this great game... please help. ;( my username on my good account is "Skylark"

Loved playing the game, I just wish there was a balance in the PvP Tournaments, can't find a tournament where everyone else isn't 20000 Points over my guys. Please fix this!! Just put a bloody +/-5000 points deviation on it! Make it more enjoyable for people who don't buy everything they see

best game on mobile i think. just make sure your account is linked to your facebook and google play so you dont ever lose your account i almost lost everything when my phone broke. luckly i got it to turn on for a bit before going off and linked my accounts. now im fine..
description: Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles! All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too! Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: - Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means! - Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! - Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other! - Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?We are now working on:- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!- Collections and unique heroes- Daily log-in bonuses- The improvement of the visual elements of the game- The optimization and balance of the game process- Performance improvementsAll of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
descriptionHTML:
Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress!

Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles!

All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too!


Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game:

- Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means!
- Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now!
- Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other!
- Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?

We are now working on:
- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.
- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!
- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!
- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!
- Collections and unique heroes
- Daily log-in bonuses
- The improvement of the visual elements of the game
- The optimization and balance of the game process
- Performance improvements
All of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!
developerAddress: Barbara Strozzilaan 201, 1083 HN in Amsterdam
recentChanges: - We are preparing Hustle Castle for a number of major updates that will include: Clan Battles, Item Enchantment, Co-op Battles, and some other new features.
- Improved spells and defense structures
- Expanded statistics at the end of a battle
- Ability to show items in the in-game chat
- New Tournament trophies

summary: Your castle, your rules!
title: Hustle Castle: Fantasy Kingdom

comments: This game is quite relaxing and can be competitive at the same time. It's a good game for you to chill.  Hi gamegos, could you do something about the accidental purchase? Example: upgrading fridge, adding order to telephone system. The button can easily clicked and cause the time spent to earn cash gone within seconds. Thanks.

I love this game it serves us my boredom reliever. I love the graphics the design and all. My complain is only about the vouchers and the expansion problem Can u please give us lot of expansion voucher bcoz i always use my cash to expand my cafe. U know that it is very hard to earn a cash. And can you lower the prices of avatar like 50 cash only bcoz 100 cash is too much.  Thank you i hope you can consider my request

Amazingly fun and addicting! But really needs a confirmation button for spending cash ("Are you sure you'd like to spend X cash?") There are buttons everywhere and I've already wasted so much cash by pure accident. That's my only complaint though :)

Love this game spent some money on it but still very fun.  They do specials on packages pretty cheap that speed things up.  Has a lot to do in it too doesnt get boring.  Good if you have a long time to play or just a couple minutes.

The game is great, reminds me of chefville that truly will be missed forever... I just dont like the fact that you need to spend quite a bit of money to really enjoy it... That is the reason I will probably quit it. :( If you dont start spending money it will be really hard to expand, you wont be able to build machines and that is the reason customers will leave negative comments... And some of the coments you get from customers are really mean and offensive... I wish they were more subtle. The prizes you can win by watching ads and inviting celebrities over are usually not helpful and dont change the situation that much. Like I said, you MUST spend money to enjoy the game. It is a great option for those who have money to throw away on frivoulus things...
Game is fun, but its hard to get all that the game has to offer without spending some real money.  Not sure if I'm going to continue
description: Design your cafe world and join cooking with one of the best restaurant games! Write your own restaurant story in Cafeland today, Chef! Master your cooking and design your 5 star cafe to be the top chef in the world! Run your own restaurant and get carried away in a cooking fever! Home cooked meals and fresh coffee are waiting for the customers. Just say “I’ll decorate my cafe and I’ll also add a lovely garden!” and your cafe will thrive! FROM A SNACK BAR TO A WORLD FAMOUS CAFE!Decorate and design the place of your dreams in this cafe game! Cook tasty food to keep your customers happy - From the creators who brought you Cafeland, it’s a fun-tastic new cooking game! In Cafeland, you have dozens of different dishes; desserts, appetizers, fast food and many more which make this the perfect kitchen game! Not to mention that there are hundreds of shiny new items to decorate your place. Are you ready to be the owner of your cafe business? Then start your restaurant game in Cafeland because this place is for you, chef!BE THE CULINARY MASTER!* Serve dishes from different cuisines.* Cook on multiple stoves and serve a variety of meals.* Unlock new recipes and grow your menu.* Fill your counters with plates of yummy dishes to please your customers.* Choose from a variety of food categories.* Make the best burger in chef town.* Deliver quality seafood.* Spread the dough for a crispy pizza.* Bake a moist chocolate cake.* Prepare a zesty stew.* Bake, boil, fry or saute; every dish will come out as perfect!DESIGN YOUR DREAM CAFE!* Choose from hundreds of fancy decorations.* Build special items to boost your income.* Cover your walls and the floor with only one click!* Open up a deli.* Design a hip bistro.* Manage a seafood restaurant.* Own a fancy venue.* Entertain VIPs at a celebrity lounge.* Become the owner of luxury dining.* Take over the city!* Design and decorate a world famous cafe!ATTRACT CELEBRITIES AND WIN GIFTS!* Invite celebrities to your place from all around the world.* Prepare your cafe to host them.* Get good remarks and win mystery gifts!RULE THE CATERING BUSINESS!* Race against time to prepare catering orders.* Fill catering boxes with different categories of food.* Deliver gourmet meals for special customers.* Get help from your friends!* Earn money and great prizes for finishing catering orders!BE A 5 STAR CHEF!* Become the master of this cafe world!* Listen to your customers and find out about the good and the bad.* Keep the place clean.* Expand to have more room!* Increase your capacity.* Fill those vending machines!* Decorate to your heart's desire!* And make it fun for everyone!PLAY WITH FRIENDS AND BECOME A SOCIAL BUTTERFLY!* Visit your friends and help them out.* Send mystery gifts to each other.* Ask for help in your catering business.* Join the community and meet new chefs!TACKLE THE QUESTS OF THE KITCHEN!* Meet the Cafeland crew and let them guide you along the way.* Complete the tasks hand in hand with Eva!* Let Katie help you out with supervisor tasks.* Ask for Chris when there is an item to build.* Join Grandpa Tony in trying out his new recipes!Facing issues while playing Cafeland or have suggestions/feedback? We would love to hear from you!Use the Contact button in settings while you are in the game or e-mail us at: cafelandmobile@gamegos.com©2016 Gamegos - All Rights Reserved

comments: Cheating or hacks are still an issue with the potential to manipulate the game growing in diversity. Im worried for the day where they obtain the ability to wipe all our progress or cards. Also please release the wight cards. You have very weak king of skull support and im sure there are many whod  love to run it
This is really fun to play in my downtime, the duels are challenging and I'm getting better at strategy and planning through my turns! I recommend, even if you're not a fan of the show/manga!

I loved this game and really got into it until the game started crashing every time I was in a pvp duel or creating a new deck. Now it crashes a couple seconds after starting it every time. Wish they had better support for these issues.

Everything was thought of. Very easy to learn the rules. And totally awesome to be able to start playing this game for real with. Out having. To spend money.. I will spend a little though to make a nice deck

This is a very polished game. Everything is on point from graphics to game play. The meta game is very diverse with many decks being fun to play. I've come to really enjoy the speed duel format as it works great for mobile gaming. Having only 3 Monster spaces and spell/trap spaces makes you think about what you are using.
This game is pretty awesome but every time I try to log in afte reinstalling it tell no data associated with this email,even if I got confirmation when I created my konami I'd
description: Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience![FEATURES]Fighting Card Games- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missionsOnline Multiplayer Battles- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai! - Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!Card Battle Deck- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!- Shop for cards in the game store!Stay tuned for future card additions![ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.[Supported OS]Android 4.4 and above
descriptionHTML:
Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!

Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience!


[FEATURES]

Fighting Card Games
- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks
- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!
- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!
- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missions

Online Multiplayer Battles
- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai!
- Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize
- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!

Card Battle Deck
- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!
- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top
- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!
- Shop for cards in the game store!
Stay tuned for future card additions!

[ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]
"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.

[Supported OS]
Android 4.4 and above

comments: Great little game except i downloaded it to play in a quiet place but after turning off music and sound it over ride the settings. I also put my phone mute on and it still played music on ads and when pressing the arrow button in the game. Not impressed

The ads in this game made it unplayable. I used to love this game and I downloaded it to try playing again and I would get minute and a half ads after every third attempt at a level. It felt like nearly every time I failed a level it would ask me if the level was too hard and I needed a hint. This game is incredibly obnoxious to play with ads on

Well i would give this five stars but you cant watch an add to get a power up! And you should lower the ad mount of adds i cant go in for 10 seconds without an add popping up!! Overall good great game
Way too many ads after every time I lose or go onto another level an advert pops up. Verry annoying. But the gameplay is decent.

Look, I understand that you have to make money somehow, and ads are how you make money on a free game. But these ads are way too frequent and obnoxious. I listen to podcasts while playing games and every minute or so my sound cuts out completely to prioritize the ad. Earn the ad by giving me a decent amount of playtime before it and stop overriding my audio.

I like the game itself but when you have 3 adds coming up after one game you hardly can enjoy the game. Super annoying, so if you download it for free be prepared to buy it otherwise it will drive you crazy!

comments: This game has been great to me forever, and I never had a complaint but this recent update has driven me here. The trophy cap is a real kick in the nuts and ruins the game for casual gamers like me. You now HAVE to advance through the games prestige system and keep resetting all your work just to help out a gang. And if you are in a strict gang like I am, they require 100 trophies a day. If I keep advancing, I won't be able to keep up with that. This is all a money grab by zepto now. They want you to have to pay to keep your machines strong so you can compete.

I love this game. I have been playing it for a very long time. I play it every single day. I like the new updates however it seems you are getting away from the original game and focusing more on ultimate machines. Increasing the prestige levels was awesome but you need to also add additional upgrades with them as well. I have over 100 paw upgrades that are completely useless to me at the moment.

Look this was a great game, worthy of it's previous accolades. Sadly since then it's been progressively ruined by an ever more aggressively enforced attempt to move to a pay to win model. Previously you could achieve anything in the game with a bit of hard work, then they tweaked it and you could achieve anything with a bit of hard work and team work. Sadly though what's happened is soft paywalls have been introduced, things you can't outright buy, but will only manage with financial outlay and change after change is being introduced with new soft paywalls and new ways to try and cash grab. The game is on a steady but rapid downward decline and to any new players I would avoid picking it up and investing your time in it now.

Great game, easy to play and a good time waster. One thing I would like to see in a future update  is a scroll bar for the parts in your garage. It would make it a lot easier than swiping through them, especially for those who have a lot of spare parts like myself. Other than that, awesome game.

This game sucks. First it is really hard to get good equipment. Then it is also very laggy. Everytime im playing the game it freezes right when im doing something. (Mainly when im customizing my car). Think about it when you are getting ths game to take up storage. If you'll excuse me now I've got a game to delete.

I had a bad day but this game fixed it,... Well enough. I've bin looking for a good game to play for a couple months now but until, like 2 days ago nothing had shown its self to me or caught my interest! This game is 11/10 to me! For probably about the next two month!
